plugins.name: AcousticBrainz Submit
plugins.description: Analysis task that executes the AcousticBrainz feature extractor and submits the results to the AcousticBrainz site.
plugins.change-notes:
1.0.3 - Updated AcousticBrainz endpoint URL.
1.0.2 - Force lower case MBIDs to avoid 405 error
1.0.1 - Better error reporting - Skip tracks longer than 30min to avoid acsubmit crash - Increased socket read timeout to give AB more time
1.0.0 - First release.
